NavigationPlaques_AD_Forge.synopsis: Player clicks on plaque near the forge.

NavigationPlaques_AD_ForgeObservingRoom.synopsis: Player clicks on plaque near Forge Observation area in Grymforge.

NavigationPlaques_AD_PanicRoom.synopsis: Player clicks on the plaque outside the Panic Room in Grymforge. It used to be a Sharran library.

NavigationPlaques_AD_Kitchen.synopsis: Player clicks plaque near kitchen in Grymforge.

NavigationPlaques_AD_Docks.synopsis: Player clicks on plaque near the Grymforge docks.

NavigationPlaques_AD_SleepingQuarters.synopsis: Player clicks on plaque to old Sharran sleeping quarters.

NavigationPlaques_AD_Forge_0.speaker: Narrator
NavigationPlaques_AD_Forge_0.text: *Centuries of blazing heat have smoothed away the plaque's inscription.*

NavigationPlaques_AD_ForgeObservingRoom_.speaker: Narrator
NavigationPlaques_AD_ForgeObservingRoom_.text: *Forge your blade in the fires, and raise it in the Mistress' name.*

NavigationPlaques_AD_PanicRoom_0.speaker: Narrator
NavigationPlaques_AD_PanicRoom_0.text: *Let feast the eyes of the faithful. Know your Goddess. Know Her command.*

NavigationPlaques_AD_Kitchen_0.speaker: Narrator
NavigationPlaques_AD_Kitchen_0.text: *Eat and drink freely, for the Lady doth come.*

NavigationPlaques_AD_Docks_0.speaker: Narrator
NavigationPlaques_AD_Docks_0.text: *Come into Her shadow. Let all that is past be forgotten.*

NavigationPlaques_AD_SleepingQuarters_0.speaker: Narrator
NavigationPlaques_AD_SleepingQuarters_0.text: *Come all who are weary. Sleep, and forget.*
